meanings.sent1: She fell down and landed right on her wazoos.
meanings.sent2: He sat on the hard bench, feeling his wazoos ache.
meanings.sent3: The toddler's wazoos wiggled as she tried to stand up.
meanings.sent4: The basketball player's wazoos moved gracefully as he dribbled down the court.
meanings.sent5: The cartoon character's wazoos were exaggeratedly round and bouncy.

meanings.sent1: There were wazoos of candies in the jar.
meanings.sent2: She had wazoos of homework to finish before bedtime.
meanings.sent3: The magician pulled wazoos of colorful scarves out of his hat.
meanings.sent4: The garden was filled with wazoos of blooming flowers.
meanings.sent5: The treasure chest was overflowing with wazoos of gold coins.
